creditline: Gift of funds from various donors, by exchange
description: silver pot with wood handle; short spout, running upwards from foot on side of body; hinged cover; chain from finial to edge of cover; club-like cutout overlay on cover
markings: On edge of finial, four small stamps: [C & Co], [(lion)], [S], [(cat\'s head?)]; on shoulder, four stamps: [C & Co], [(lion)], [(cat\'s head?)], [S]; on edge of cover, stamped: [C & Co], [(lion)], [S]; on bottom, stamped: [130 REGENT ST/ CARRINGTON & CO/ LONDON, W.]; on bottom: very lightly incised numbers
object_name: Milk Pot, from Two-piece Café au Lait Set
title: Milk Pot, from Two-piece Café au Lait Set
